# Gallery

This gallery shows advanced examples of what you can do with the `tinytable` package. The full code and data are given next to each screenshot.

## Wines

Original table designed by [Abdoul Madjid](https://www.abdoulblog.com) and submitted to the RStudio table contest in `gt` format. Code and data for the `tinytable` converstion are [available on Github.](https://github.com/vincentarelbundock/tinytable/tree/main/gallery/wines)

![](figures/gallery_wines.png){fig-alt="Table showing a list of wines with various attributes including price, rating, and origin."}

## Students

Original table designed by [Illak Blog](https://illak-blog.netlify.app/posts/tabla_gt_se/tablas_gt_se), where it was created in `gt` format. Code and data for the `tinytable` conversion are [available on GitHub.](https://github.com/vincentarelbundock/tinytable/tree/main/gallery/students)

![](figures/gallery_students.png)
